question.title: Median Employee Salary
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Find Median Given Frequency of Numbers", "titleSlug": "find-median-given-frequency-of-numbers", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Still remember how to select the sum which group by one column?
Try to think about how to get the median from a sorted list.
How to get the median one item for odd number list while how to get the median two items for even number list, try to unify them.
